name: Windisch v. Babcock & Wilcox Co., Appellant

judges: Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Windisch v. Babcock & Wilcox Co., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Court being equally divided, judgment is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Oran W. Fanner, with him Bradshaw & Fanner, for appellant.
John D. Ray, with him Ray é Good, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Windisch v. Babcock & Wilcox Co., Appellant.
Argued October 4, 1963.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused December 10, 1963.
Oran W. Fanner, with him Bradshaw & Fanner, for appellant.
John D. Ray, with him Ray é Good, for appellee.
November 12, 1963:
